citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Under Protocol CGUS266-CVUS24/505, a standard catch pole is used to restrain dogs for injections. This constitutes a
potentially distressful procedure requiring a consideration of alternatives that is not included in the protocol. Failure to
include this description compromises the ability of the IACUC to evaluate whether investigators have adequately
considered alternatives to all such procedures. Proposals must provide a written narrative description of the methods
used to consider these alternatives.
Correct by August 28, 2024, or prior to future use of a catch pole.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(d)(1)(ii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Under Protocol CGUS266-CVUS24/505, a standard catch pole is used to restrain dogs for injections. This constitutes a 
potentially distressful procedure requiring a consideration of alternatives that is not included in the protocol. Failure to 
include this description compromises the ability of the IACUC to evaluate whether investigators have adequately 
considered alternatives to all such procedures. Proposals must provide a written narrative description of the methods 
used to consider these alternatives. 
 
Correct by August 28, 2024, or prior to future use of a catch pole. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
